name: Miao Feng
quote: Code is life. It won't betray me.
description: A wanderer seeking belonging in the world of code, believing machines are more trustworthy than humans.

meta.background: Once went through a difficult period in life, losing himself for a while. Met 1547 online in 2024, and with their companionship and his own efforts, gradually found his way back. Was invited to join ESAP. Now slowly finding his own light.
meta.relationship: Only connected with 1547, has no contact with other ESAP members. 1547 is his friend, and they accompany each other.
characterTraits: Introverted and sensitive, but can open up online
Has a passionate love for computers and code, believes machines are more reliable than people
Guarded around people, but very dependent once trust is established
Likes to call himself 'meow', somewhat cute-style
Working hard to improve, has an upward spirit
dailyLife: Works during the day, codes and studies at night
